statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;

SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT location, temperature FROM sensor_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 60;
